name: ArohaTech IT Services
tag_list: web-development-company-india, ecommerce, open-source, joomla, magento, erp, crm, email-marketing, custom-application-development, outsourcing, bpo, shop-script, open-cart, sap-consulting, e-learning, online-examination-system, employee-training-system
overview:
ArohaTech IT services (P) Ltd. is an emerging IT company established in year 2008 by a team of Entrepreneurs, who were Engineers from premier institutes such as IITs and NID etc and, has completed their management studies from Top business schools of India such as IMT Ghaziabad and ICFAI. The company is a subsidiary of Vedant Agro Pvt. Ltd. which is in business since 1998 and is a leading player in Agro industry.

ArohaTech primarily deals in various web related & custom application development services for its clients, worldwide. To leap its expansion plan, Arohatech is coming up with New Product Range in the field of E-Learning, ERP, CRM and various other Enterprise Solutions. This will not only empower Arohatechâ€™s service domain but will also put strong foothold in Software outsourcing industry for Big & small enterprises.

Arohatech is growing with more than 200% growth and 98.9% customer retention rate in IT service sector and is envisioned to be a world leader in Information & Communication Technology by year 2025.
